summary: Bat files to instantly gain crafting skills/perks.
descriptionHtml:
Contains bat files to instantly max smithing, enchanting, and alchemy.  Each one will add all the perks in the designated tree and set your skill to 100 without gaining experience.  Contains nothing you can\'t already do in the console, just makes it easier.

First play through I did the whole crafting grind, and I was not looking forward to doing it again.  Compiled these for myself but sharing for those who feel the same about crafting.

Install-

Place all text files into your Skyrim directory (same place as the launcher)
Start up game, load/make a character, and open console (`)
Type in any of the following
	bat smithing
	bat enchanting
	bat alchemy

Enjoy the benefits of crafting without the time spent grinding, perk points wasted, or xp gained from non combat skills.

Uninstall-
They\'re text files, just delete them.
author: Space84
